::Perndabot::

Perndabot turns around in his chair, glancing at the scanner in front 
of him. It had beeped a few moments earlier, reporting a detected 
signature. He studies the scanner, seeing that the signature was 
Maximal. He grins, taking out his gun and exiting the base, setting 
off toward the Maximal (Shadow Wing).
